name: Casa Acacia
description:
Looking for a relaxing game like Animal Crossing or Stardew Valley to escape these exciting times, but on a tight budget? Look no further! In Casa Acacia you simply create a character, choose the perfect tree for you and start decorating it! On your adventures you can gather building materials and blueprints that unlock new building options!

Controls:
Arrow keys to move and jump
At home: Hold 1 for menu, hold 2 to build
In the wild: Press 1 to chop wood, press 2 to collect materials

Features I'm hoping to implement in the future:
Gamepad support
Xbox Controller support
Different enemies
More "events" to encounter (puzzle/platforming levels)
Stats visible in character selection menu
Mobile version (Android first)
Local multiplayer
Open for more suggestions

Donations would of course help towards implementing these features, but no pressure! This is supposed to be a zen experience after all!

My other game projects can be found here: http://www.wvv-games.com/
You can also support me by buying some merch: https://buy-a-bunny.com/

Cheers,

Wouter van Vugt
